summary: Software Engineer with 3+ years of experience delivering state-of-the-art software/web applications to high-value clients. Pursuing a Master's degree in Computer Science with a concentration on Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning. Seeking summer internship for 2023 in Data Science and ML domain.

experience.description: Research based on Deep Learning, Computer Vision, and Natural Language Processing, on biofilm publications, to develop a multi-modal domain-specific document classification framework
Led the development team and was involved in feature development for an in-house project management automation tool and compliance management tool for an international clienteles
Developed and Maintained solution for XStore and React Project
Trained in Retail and developing POS systems

projects.name: Nepali Braille
projects.description: A hardware based android application which allows users to learn braille in Devanagari script using tactile buttons and voice output through an android device. Used Arduino, Android studio, Java.

projects.name: YouTube Comment Sentiment Analysis
projects.description: A web application developed in Flask, designed to interpret YouTube comments on user-fed videos and determine the overall sentiment/reaction of its viewers. Used Python, Flask, Scikit-learn, Natural Language toolkit, etc.

projects.name: Missionary and Cannibal Game
projects.description: An interactive visualization of the infamous Missionary and Cannibal puzzle. Used Python, PyGame, Graphvi, pyDotplus
